title: Account/Server Transfers.. STILL DOWN?
body:
Hi Riot and Community.

I was just wondering if anyone seems to have any insight of when account/server transfers will be back?
Service Status, states that it has been down since Thursday morning, which is an exceptionally long time for something to not receive a fix.
I understand the riot team is working on a fix for the on going issues with transfers, just looking for an approximate ETA from anyone, if possible.


Thank you in advance!
